rationale: Assessed as Least Concern due to its wide distribution and the lack of any known major widespread threats.  This species is also reported to be common in at least one area of its range.
assessor: Jenkins, A., Kullander, F.F. & Tan, H.H.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
